113

Growing gregariously in open mixed oak woodland near Red Mulberry, Northern Red Oak, Eastern Red Bud, Chinkapin Oak, and Elm trees. 

6cm height and cap 5-6cm wide.

- Cross veins between lamellae present.
- Pileipellis slightly viscid, slowly turning reddish-brown with application of KOH. 
- Smells mealy. 
- Tastes acrid (spicy).
